boundary_notes: Coastal An Thuong/My An nightlife + serviced apartments; between Vo Nguyen Giap (sea) and Tran Bach Dang (riverfront), south of Dragon Bridge.
utilities_electricity_note: Urban grid generally stable; storm-season outages possible.
utilities_internet_note: FTTH common in built-up zones; verify in older/rural stock.
safety_notes: Tourist/beach zone: petty theft risk higher; low violent crime overall.
noise_air_quality_notes: Night noise on bar corridors; sea breeze; city PM2.5 can be moderate.
aliases: An Thuong;My An Ward;Beach Expat Area
Pros: Best expat infrastructure walkable beach cafes restaurants
Cons: Prices rising noisy construction tourist mix

wards_pre2025: Phuoc My|An Hai Bac|An Hai Dong|An Hai Tay
